Testimonials.label: Testimonials
Testimonials.title: What our clients are sharing.
Testimonials.subtitle: Discover the glowing feedback from our delighted customers worldwide.

reviews.1: HeadShots.fun has completely transformed my workflow. The AI tools are not only efficient but also fun to use, making the headshot creation process both professional and enjoyable.
reviews.2: HeadShots.fun made it super easy to create professional headshots for all my social media campaigns.
reviews.3: HeadShots.fun has significantly enhanced my brand work by providing professional-quality images that perfectly align with my brand's style.
reviews.4: Creating headshots for my startup has never been this easy and enjoyable. HeadShots.fun delivers fantastic results while keeping the process light and fun.
reviews.5: I love how HeadShots.fun balances creativity and professionalism. The flexibility of the AI tools allows me to design headshots that are both fun and perfectly suited to my creative projects.
reviews.6: The efficiency and quality of HeadShots.fun are outstanding. I was able to create studio-quality headshots in seconds, and the process was surprisingly enjoyable.
reviews.7: HeadShots.fun has been a valuable tool for our marketing campaigns. The AI-generated headshots are not only professional but also have a unique, fun element that makes our profiles stand out.
reviews.8: The quality and speed of HeadShots.fun are impressive. I was able to create a professional headshot that looks like it was done in a studio, all within seconds.

PricingPageFAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
PricingPageFAQ.label: Pricing
PricingPageFAQ.subtitle: Frequently asked questions about our pricing.
qa: HeadShots.fun is an AI-powered platform that allows you to create unique and stunning headshots quickly and easily, personalized for every occasion.
How does the credit system work?

1 Credit = 1 Headshot. We offer various credit packages to suit different needs. You can purchase credits that can be used to generate AI headshots. The more credits you buy, the better value you get.
What's the pricing for credit packages?
Our pricing starts at $2.99, perfect for trying out our service. We also offer larger packages, with our most popular choice being $19.9 Plan Snapshot Superstar, ideal for regular users.
Are there any features to help customize my headshots?
Yes! We offer AI-powered tools designed to make every headshot uniquely yours. You can explore various features to unleash your creativity and personalize your headshots for different occasions.
How fast is the AI technology used for generating headshots?
We use the fastest AI technology available to ensure quick and efficient headshot generation, typically in 10 seconds. Our goal is to provide you with stunning results in the shortest time possible.
What kind of photos should I upload to the platform?

We recommend that you upload multiple front-facing photos to ensure that your profile picture is as accurate as possible. These photos should show a clear/unobstructed view of your face. Please make sure your photos are clear, high-quality, and do not include other people or animals.
Can I use the same photo for multiple headshots?
Yes, you can use the same photo for multiple headshots. Our AI technology allows for multiple outputs from a single photo, so you can create different looks and styles with the same image.
